ClassDesc: This class represents a Trigger Event - the event associated with a Trigger Sensor. When the sensor detects a trigger event condition, such as significant motion in the case of the @B_android#hardware#Sensor#TYPE_SIGNIFICANT_MOTION_E@, the @B_android#hardware#TriggerEventListener_E@ is called with the TriggerEvent. The sensor is automatically canceled after the trigger. This class holds information such as the value of the sensor when the trigger happened, the timestamp along with detailed information regarding the Sensor itself.
